statements: DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND area_name = 'Downtown'
DELETE FROM air_quality_data WHERE pollution_level > 50 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM sensor_locations WHERE latitude < 40.0 AND longitude > -75.0;
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM pollution_data WHERE sensor_id = (SELECT sensor_id FROM sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Indoor') AND pollution_level > 100;
DELETE FROM areas WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM cities WHERE city_name = 'New York';
